    Generic Connection Client.

    • Method Detail

      • initConnection

        java.net.HttpURLConnection initConnection(Request request)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Prepare a new connection with necessary custom header fields.
        Parameters:
        request - The request object.
        Returns:
        A new url connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while opening the connection.

      • execute

        Response execute(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        InternalNetworkException
        Invokes an http request.
        Parameters:
        connection - The http connection.
        Returns:
        The response object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while connecting to the resource.
        InternalNetworkException - If an internal sdk error occurs while parsing the response.
